entities.name: bowtruckles
entities.description: Bowtruckles are tree-guardians that live in wand-trees. They eat wood lice and fairy eggs.

entities.name: miss granger
entities.description: Miss Granger is a student who correctly identifies the creatures as bowtruckles.

entities.name: professor grubly-plank
entities.description: Professor Grubbly-Plank is a teacher who agrees with Miss Granger's identification of the creatures and awards Gryffindor house points.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who observes the bowtruckles eating wood lice.

relationships.description: Miss Granger correctly identifies the creatures as bowtruckles.
Professor Grubbly-Plank awards Gryffindor house points for Miss Granger's correct identification of the creatures.
Harry observes the bowtruckles eating wood lice.
